General.Name: Marshall Monteagle PLC
General.Description: Marshall Monteagle PLC, an investment holding company, engages in the import and distribution, and property holding businesses in the United Kingdom, South Africa, Switzerland, Europe, and the United States. The company owns and manages commercial property, and multi-tenanted rent properties; and imports, exports, distributes, and trades in non-perishable food, food ingredients, household consumer products, metal and minerals, hand tools, and machinery. It also engages in the food processing and logistics business. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is based in St Helier, Jersey.
General.Address: GaspE House, Saint Helier, Jersey, JE1 1GH
